metadata.name: Bash Interactive Shell
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the bash shell with the interactive flag "-i".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bash')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i ')))

output.summary: Detects execution of the bash shell with the interactive flag "-i".

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown References: https://pentestmonkey.net/cheat-sheet/shells/reverse-shell-cheat-sheet, https://www.revshells.com/, https://linux.die.net/man/1/bash
